english_example_sentence: The small child was the person who broke the old vase on the table.
russian_example_sentence: Маленький ребенок был тем, кто разбил старую вазу на столе.
turkish_example_sentence: Küçük çocuk, masadaki eski vazoyu kıran kişiydi.
